entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
